reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cashmere cardigan soft, well-made, and comfortable, with one mentioning it pairs well with most blouses. Customers disagree on whether it's worth the price and experience varying levels of itchiness.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely garment
items.body: The soft, light weight cashmere sweater in an attractive blue color is a good addition to my fall wardrobe. The length lends the garment an up-to-date fashion statement. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great basic cashmere cardigan for the price
items.body: I don't know why it's so hard to find a classic plain black cashmere cardigan with a deep V these days, but it just is. The cashmere in this one could be a tad softer, but for the price I don't expect something the quality of Vince. Looks fabulous, fits true to size (i.e., the XS is actually XS), so unless you are going for a slouchy look, take your regular size. It's exactly what I needed. The V is deep and will require something underneath unless you're going for that kind of look, in which case it isn't so deep that your bra will be showing all over the place. When mine arrived, one of the buttons was loose. Otherwise I can find no flaws with it. I only took one star off because the quality is good but didn't blow me away - if you want something with no scratchiness at all, keep looking. Read more
items.author: Blackheart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous cashmere sweater for a great price and good fit
items.body: I loved this product. I purchased a slightly larger size as i wanted a more relaxed fit. It is soft but not too thick which is exactly what I wanted. Lovely and warm, great for layering. Now I want one in each colour!! Read more
items.author: Bermuda Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: I wear it all the time. Had some trouble getting it to me but it finally arrived and it was worth the wait. Fits well, soft soft soft, great style! Read more
items.author: Sue3340

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth The Money
items.body: Very good quality sweater! Great blue color! Love IT! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Burley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks really nice.
items.body: Seems well made. I liked the fit and feels soft. Only complaint it feels scratchy on my arms while wearing. I’ll be sure to have on long sleeves when I wear it. Read more
items.author: H F

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars There is no way this is 100% cashmere
items.body: I ordered this to replace a 20-year old cashmere sweater, and have both that and a Lands End sweater as comparison. Both of the other sweaters are soft and fluid; this is stiffer and itchy. NOT 100% CASHMERE, if I had to guess, maybe 50% cashmere tops. I don't like wool sweaters, and this is unpleasant to wear based on both texture and stiffness. Returning. Read more
items.author: Chris D. Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buena calidad.
items.author: Larisa Kutovaia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Undyed White, Bella Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
